title: Appmobi Secure Mobile Platform
tooltip: A simple structure app with example hooks for using the Appmobi secure development platform.
description: [Android only - see README for details]. A simple structure app with example hooks for using the Appmobi secure development platform. Using this sample requires a free Appmobi license. Signup now for a free demo license. You also must edit the Appmobi Secure Mobile Platform plugin variables to point to your PrivateStack app within the XDK Plugin Management section.
